name: jquery-lottery
title: jQuery Lottery
readme:
# jquery-lottery [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/kennym/jquery-lottery.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/kennym/jquery-lottery) Simple lottery fun. Underscore.js required. ## Version v0.1.0 ## Website Url https://github.com/kennym/jquery-lottery ## Bug tracker If you find a bug, please raise it the [issue here](https://github.com/kennym/jquery-lottery/issues) on Github! ## Documenation - Basic usage ```html
  • Foo
  • Bar
  • FooBar
``` ```javascript $('#lottery').lottery(); ``` ## Developer Developed by Kenny Meyer, http://www.kennymeyer.net + [Github Profile](http://github.com/kennym)
